mapper.sql: SERIAL_NUMBER, EMPLOYEE_ID, RECODING_TIME, INFORMATION, REWARD, PUNISHMENT
mapper.insert: insert into REWARD_AND_PUNISHMENT ( EMPLOYEE_ID, RECODING_TIME, INFORMATION, REWARD, PUNISHMENT) values (#{employeeId}, #{recodingTime},#{information}, #{reward}, #{punishment})
mapper.select:
select EMPLOYEE_ID,SUM(REWARD) REWARD,SUM(PUNISHMENT) PUNISHMENT from REWARD_AND_PUNISHMENT where 1=1
AND EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( #{date} , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( RECODING_TIME, '%Y%m' ) ) =1
group by EMPLOYEE_ID
mapper.update: update REWARD_AND_PUNISHMENT set EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}, RECODING_TIME = #{recodingTime}, INFORMATION = #{information}, REWARD = #{reward}, PUNISHMENT = #{punishment} where SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber}
